generated_body: The article titled "Fox legal analyst Napolitano emerges as Trump critic" is likely to explore the evolving stance of legal analyst Andrew Napolitano regarding former President Donald Trump. Readers may expect an examination of Napolitano's previous support for Trump, juxtaposed with his recent criticisms. The article could provide insights into specific instances where Napolitano has diverged from Trump, possibly discussing legal implications or broader political ramifications.
